name: Aid
description: Your spell bolsters allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.
higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target's hit points increase by 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

components.materialDescription: a tiny strip of white cloth

effects.description: Each target's maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.
